content.rendered:
Case Manager | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time
  • Responsible for monitoring and evaluating the plan of care for patients and will provide clinical skills and expertise in a professional manner in the assessment, planning, implementation and coordination of health care services
  • BSN or MSW preferred
  • Three to five years of acute care hospital experience with critical care or ED experience desired
  • Knowledge of utilization management as it relates to third-party payers and experience with managed care preferred
  • Basic computer skills, excellent verbal and written communication skills required
  • Current Oklahoma RN License and Current BLS
  • ACLS required within 12 months of hire
  • Responsible for greeting patients, answering phones with a smile, making and rescheduling appointments, taking co-pays, scanning information, and other front office duties
  • Salary is commensurate with experience
